title: Validate No Inline Types Executor
description: Validates that inline type literals are not used - prefer named types/interfaces/classes.

mode.description: OFF: skip validation. NEW_METHODS: only new methods in diff. NEW_AND_MODIFIED_METHODS: new methods + methods with changes. MODIFIED_FILES: all inline types in modified files.

disableAllowed.description: Whether disable comments work. When false, no escape hatch.

ignoreModifiedUntilEpoch.description: Epoch seconds. Until this time, skip validation entirely. When expired, normal mode resumes. Omit when not needed.
